experiences.title: Software Tester
experiences.description: Designed and executed integration, functional, regression and data validation tests across iOS and Android. Developed automated tests and user documentation to improve quality and support.

experiences.title: Full-stack Developer — Practice
experiences.description: Coursant and practicant to built and tested an e-learning platform using React, Next.js, Node.js, and NestJS. Collaborated with the team to improve reliability and code quality.

experiences.title: QA Coordinator
experiences.description: Led mobile QA team, managed test cases in TestRail, and tracked tasks in Jira. Estimated timelines and optimized test processes for on-time delivery.

experiences.title: QA Engineer
experiences.description: Tested mobile and web apps using (mainly) manual and automated tools like Detox and Cypress. Ensured coverage through TestRail and continuous improvement.

experiences.title: Technical Support Engineer
experiences.description: Provided support for home automation users. Reported bugs in Jira, maintained documentation in Confluence, and managed tickets via Desk.com.

experiences.title: Junior IT System Engineer
experiences.description: Delivered IT support, configured hardware/software, and managed tickets using ITSM tools. Supported internal teams and infrastructure.

education.title: Master of Science in Electrical Engineering
